snippet.title: Enter the Chronosphere - Official Gameplay Trailer | Publisher Spotlight 2024 (Joystick Ventures)
snippet.description:
Check out gameplay and see various biomes from Enter the Chronosphere in this latest trailer for the upcoming turn-based tactics roguelike game featuring bullet hell action. The trailer gives a breakdown of what you can expect from the gameplay of Enter the Chronosphere, like how the world moves with you when you do, equipping loadouts, creating different builds with exotic gear, and more. Enter the Chronosphere will be available on PC. 

Enter the Chronosphere is a psychedelic roguelike that blurs the line between real-time action and turn-based tactics. Play as misfit aliens, craft wild combinations between hundreds of weapons, items and abilities, and disable uncharted chronospheres: Colossal structures that consume time and distort reality.
